metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14927 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
In Poppler 0.59.0, a NULL Pointer Dereference exists in theSplashOutputDev::type3D0() function in SplashOutputDev.cc via a crafted PDFdocument.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-14927` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-poppler-0.18 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
libpoppler-cpp0v5 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
libpoppler-glib8 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt4-4 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
libpoppler-qt5-1 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
libpoppler68 - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
poppler-utils - 0.57.0-2ubuntu4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: poppler package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.57.0-2ubuntu4').
